title: World War I home front - trend

content.question: Which of the following occurred on the home front during the First World War?

choices.label: The United States public expressed widespread anti-German sentiment.
Military commanders desegregated the armed forces.
The United States government placed Japanese Americans in relocation camps.
Women joined the military in large numbers.
The federal government issued rationing coupons for food and gasoline.

content.answer: The United States public expressed widespread anti-German sentiment.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
